name: Hinged Arena
description:
A shooter with a randomly rotating arena comprised of boxes that randomly do stuff like spawn enemies every 10 seconds,  shoot the boxes while they're active or shoot down enemies to score some points.

Controls : AWD to move and jump, left click to shoot.

Made for the Geta Game Jam 12 : "Instability"

Music : "Pressure" - yd (OpenGameArt.org)

Sounds :

  • "Click" - qubodup (OpenGameArt.org)
  • "Laser fire" - farfadet46 (OpenGameArt.org)
  • "Attack miss or hit sounds(2)" - pauliuw (OpenGameArt.org)
